project1.name: ChromaCube
project1.disc: A rotating kaleidoscope of forms and shades, where every face of the cube unveils a new palette

project2.name: VortexCube
project2.disc: A transforming cube that comes alive with textures and shimmers with tactile illusions

project3.name: PictoCube
project3.disc: A gallery-cube, where images awaken on its faces in perfect harmony of perspective

project4.name: CubeForge
project4.disc: A digital workshop where you can forge and reshape your own cubes in real time

project5.name: Orbitron
project5.disc: A space of light and motion, where cubes shine, transform, and give birth to new visions

about.title: Reactorium 3D
about.more02: 🔮 Reactorium 3D is a “React laboratory in the space of three dimensions”, where React, Three.js and React Three Fiber merge to create interactive worlds filled with shapes, motion and light.
about.more03: 🧪 Each application here is a small experiment in a three-dimensional environment, ranging from abstract scenes and dynamic objects to interactive tools and games. 🎭 Here geometry comes alive right in the browser, light and shadows bring depth and atmosphere, and the magic of interaction turns the three-dimensional world into a space that responds to your every move.
about.more04: 🚀 Reactorium 3D is a territory of experiments and discoveries, where code becomes the material for creativity, and three-dimensionality transforms every idea into an extraordinary experience. 🌟
about.name: About
